oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Storming of Fort Donelson - Decisive Bayonet Charge of the Iowa Second Regiment of the Rebel Entrenchments
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Print showing Federal soldiers assaulting Confederate troops in the forest around Fort Donelson. Reverse of print has articles, poetry, and news columns.

Frank Leslie was an English-American engraver who published numerous periodicals. "Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper," later called "Frank Leslie's Weekly," was a popular magazine featuring prints, images and photographs of contemporary events.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Stewart County (Tenn.)
Soldiers
